segments.text: Ugh, what a gross mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing for cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's all wobbly, probably covered in grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into that jar with who knows what on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just hovering there, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, towel all bunched—it's unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't save this sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel queasy just looking at the disregard for cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
